hero.title: Create Memorable Experiences Together
hero.description: Loveomelet helps couples create meaningful moments through monthly activities, building a year of memories to cherish forever.

step1.title: Monthly Word
step1.description: Each month, you'll receive a random word (an "egg") from our curated list of rare and interesting words.

step2.title: Plan Together
step2.description: Use our reflection tools to brainstorm and plan an activity related to your monthly word.

step3.title: Create Memories
step3.description: Complete your activity together and document it with photos and private reflections.

step4.title: Year-End Surprise
step4.description: At the end of the year, reveal your private comments and create a beautiful memory book of your experiences.

lovingChefs.title: Loving Chefs
lovingChefs.description: Both partners share equal responsibility in planning and executing each month's activity.

chefAndCritic.title: Chef and Critic
chefAndCritic.description: Take turns with one partner planning (the Chef) and the other documenting (the Critic).
features: Chef plans and funds the activity
Critic creates the report and documentation

testimonials.title: What Couples Are Saying
testimonials.testimonial1: "Loveomelet helped us rediscover the joy of spending quality time together. We've created memories that will last a lifetime."
testimonials.testimonial2: "The monthly challenges pushed us out of our comfort zone in the best way possible. We've tried things we never would have otherwise!"

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Create a year of unforgettable experiences with your partner.

footer.tagline: Create memorable experiences with your partner
